name: The Swarm (SoulBounded, Kaynn Cahya)
description:
The end is near as The Swarm approaches! Defend yourself with unlimited supply of grenades and survive for as long as possible. Take caution as The Swarm gets stronger the more you kill. How long can you survive?

Controls:
- Move with Joystick or Arrow keys
- Shoot with A or Z key (On the keyboard)

Made by:
- https://soulbounded.itch.io/- https://kaynn-cahya.itch.io/

Asset Credits:
- https://www.kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts- https://freesound.org/

Note: Windows build is temporary disabled due to a bug in game. Will re upload once the jam is over.
